sentences.en: Accordingly, what must push state - owned economy energetically is strategical adjust with reorganization.
sentences.cn: 因此, 必须大力推进 国有 经济的战略性调整与改组.

sentences.en: Acquisition has become the effective mechanism of enterprises reorganization capitalism re contribution.
sentences.cn: 企业并购已成企业重组以及重新分配资本的有效机制.

sentences.en: All our efforts are pushing towards a reorganization of the prison system.
sentences.cn: 我们正尽一切努力去整顿监狱系统.

sentences.en: Asset Evaluation expired become one of the reorganization of the controversy.
sentences.cn: 资产评估过期成为重组的争议之一.

sentences.en: It included questionnaire design explanation, collection, reorganization and findings statistical analysis.
sentences.cn: 问卷设计说明 、 收集 、 整理和研究结果的统计分析.

sentences.en: Preliminary achievements were made in the adjustment of some of the major industries through reform, reorganization and transformation.
sentences.cn: 通过改革、改组、改造，对一些重要行业进行了调整，取得了初步成效。

sentences.en: Preplan of the material assets reorganization of the listed company.
sentences.cn: 上市公司重大资产重组预案.

sentences.en: Reorganization inevitably involves some recovery and redelegation of authority.
sentences.cn: 机构的改组难免牵涉到收回职权和重新授权的问题.

sentences.en: Reorganization is necessary on the distributive side of this industry.
sentences.cn: 就这个行业的配销方面来说，重组是必要的。

sentences.en: Since its reorganization, the business is on a much firmer footing.
sentences.cn: 商行改组后, 基础更稳固了.

sentences.en: The committee drew out a plan for the reorganization.
sentences.cn: 委员会大略说明了改组的方案.

sentences.en: The program involves changes in ownership, a major reorganization of assets.
sentences.cn: 该方案涉及公司股权变动 、 重大资产重组.

sentences.en: The reorganization will give us a whole bunch of problems.
sentences.cn: 重新改组会给我们带来一连串的问题.

sentences.en: Trading in " Reorganization and Disbandment " had closed with a rise of half a dollar.
sentences.cn: 编 遣 公债终于在跳起半元的收盘价格下拍过去了!

sentences.en: VIII. Encourage foreign investors to take part in SOE reorganization and transformation.
sentences.cn: 八、鼓励外商参与国有企业改组、改造.

sentences.en: We want to announce the reorganization of our firm. But the service will be continued.
sentences.cn: 我们想通知你方我方改组了。但是我们的服务不变。

sentences.en: Your suggestion belongs under the general heading of employment reorganization.
sentences.cn: 你的建议应归入就业改造这一总的范畴.

words.tran_cn: 重组（reorganize的过去分词）；整顿；重新制定

trans.tran_cn: 改组，改编，重新制定，整顿
